title: Adigvcdh
author: Adigvcdh
content: Friendsâ€‹ on Bitcointalk!Weï»¿Â would likeâ€‹ to introduce you Cogitex (CGTX)â€‹ - ourï»¿Â token thatâ€‹ isï»¿Â truly honest and reliable. Thisâ€‹ is something new, and you will seeâ€‹ it for yourself!âœ… Transparencyâ€‹ in Motion:â€‹ We are notï»¿Â goingâ€‹ to hide anything. All Cogitex spending and transfers willâ€‹ beâ€‹ inï»¿Â plain sight.â€‹ We willï»¿Â share all informationâ€‹ on Twitter.ðŸš€â€‹ AI Development: Ourï»¿Â money will alsoâ€‹ go towards artificial intelligence development.ï»¿Â Don't loseï»¿Â sightâ€‹ of us, stayï»¿Â tunedâ€‹ to our news!ðŸš€ðŸš€ Mars Colonization:â€‹ We believe that the futureâ€‹ of humanityâ€‹ is tiedâ€‹ toï»¿Â Mars. Cogitexâ€‹ is not onlyï»¿Â about cryptocurrency, but alsoï»¿Â about new horizons.Whatâ€‹ do youï»¿Â thinkï»¿Â about thisï»¿Â idea? Your opinionâ€‹ is importantâ€‹ to us. Pleaseï»¿Â share your thoughts and questions!

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: QuoteWhatâ€‹ do youï»¿ thinkï»¿ about thisï»¿ idea? Your opinionâ€‹ is importantâ€‹ to us. Pleaseï»¿ share your thoughts and questions!I am hesitant to believe what you stated because you have not proven a single one of them yet.Â  It is easy to make a promise and write goals and a roadmap but many have difficulties in achieving them.Â  I do not know if you are one of those who will fail to deliver or those who will succeed.Â  And if your purpose is to create a project and have a crowdfunding, I do not think that the idea of Mars colonization will ever be realized.Â  the crowdfunding itself states that the project has no funds (if ever you asked for one). Btw, sorry for being skeptical because we have seen a lot of these kinds of promises and they never deliver.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: 1. Not sure what you mean by transparency but all transactions of public blockchains are non-private by default. If you want to be transparent, you team needs to share how your tokens are distrubuted. Who gets what and when? Also if it's a token contract, publish and verify it so more people can take a look and verify your claims.The pride of Blockchain and crypto is building a trustless financial economy. We don't need to trust your team.2. AI and Blockchain are distinct (Deterministic vs Non-Deterministic). My question is why?3. Same as above. Why? Makes zero sense if majority of your users will be on earth.

Such money grabbing shitcoins are what make so many people hate crypto in general. Most of the time it's just about lies and impossible road maps.

Btw, sorry for being skeptical because we have seen a lot of these kinds of promises and they never deliver.I understand why you're skeptical, and that'sï»¿Â fine.ï»¿Â There have indeed been many promisesâ€‹ in the cryptocurrencyï»¿Â world thatï»¿Â never materialized.This projectâ€‹ is not justï»¿Â wordsâ€‹ on paper.â€‹ We are not asking for funding from investorsï»¿Â right now. Our goalâ€‹ isâ€‹ to create somethingï»¿Â truly unique and valuable. And regardingï»¿Â Mars, yes,â€‹ itâ€‹ is ambitious.The most importantï»¿Â thingâ€‹ is your trust.â€‹ We are workingâ€‹ on Cogitex andâ€‹ we will deliverâ€‹ on our promises. Remember, the biggest achievementsï»¿Â start with dreams and ambitions.

comments.author: Adigvcdh

Makes zero sense if majority of your users will be on earth. Transparencyâ€‹ is oneâ€‹ of the important benefitsâ€‹ of blockchain, youï»¿Â know?â€‹ We understand your concerns and wantâ€‹ to assure you:â€‹ we will alwaysâ€‹ be transparent. Our allocations and transactions willâ€‹ be available for public viewing. It's importantâ€‹ toâ€‹ us thatï»¿Â every investor can see what's happening withï»¿Â their investments.â€‹ Weï»¿Â pride ourselvesâ€‹ on this transparency and will always adhereâ€‹ to this philosophy.AI and blockchain are two different worlds, but they can coexist magnificently. Blockchain providesâ€‹ a secure and transparent recordâ€‹ ofï»¿Â data,ï»¿Â whileâ€‹ AI allowsâ€‹ usâ€‹ to process and analyze that information. They complement eachï»¿Â other and can leadâ€‹ to amazing innovations.Evenâ€‹ if the majorityâ€‹ of ourï»¿Â users areï»¿Â Earth dwellers,â€‹ we seeï»¿Â broad prospectsâ€‹ in space. Exploring and colonizingï»¿Â other planetsâ€‹ is not onlyâ€‹ aï»¿Â great scientific achievement, but alsoâ€‹ a potential future for humanity.â€‹ We areï»¿Â readyâ€‹ to explore not only our planet, but the entire universe!

Each project developsâ€‹ at its ownï»¿Â pace. Everything goes its own way, and successï»¿Â comesâ€‹ toï»¿Â those whoï»¿Â standâ€‹ up forï»¿Â theirï»¿Â ideas and are not afraidâ€‹ of difficulties.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I'm not a geek.But these things should be not really be explained at all. I mean, in kind of the business off cour you need to be (Transparent, Reliable and following kind of term & condition). If project need to explain these.I'm to worried, end really worst.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: Maybe you are the marketing team or founder of this project that you are promoting? You seem to need good promotion, not just explaining with text. Moreover, you didn't include a link to be able to see the project or just to research it. If it's just some shitcoin and doesn't have any growth, don't bother promoting it too much. You have to prove that what you are promoting is true and what the future holds for this project.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: There isn't even a link to check it out, or any type of information. We believe our future is in mars? That's it? So? I mean why would that matter as a sentence, what are you going to do, you gonna ask for funding to go build a colony at mars? Because if not, then this makes no sense at all to me and shouldn't for anyone else neither.People are making sure that they are doing something without them actually doing anything and that just feels funny to me. You said bunch of things without saying anything at all which is an accomplishment and many journalists does that, think about that as your next move on your career. This is just an idea on a piece of paper and feels like it is not going to be that much of a big deal.

And I have already said a lot of times that we are not going to colonize Mars tomorrow. First we will develop the AI sector, in the future we will create our own android robots, and even later we will first explore the Moon, and then in the future we can colonize Mars.
